thread.title: Watch Trump's Primetime Announcement on Supreme Court Pick
thread.title_full: Watch Trump's Primetime Announcement on Supreme Court Pick

author: THR Staff
title: Watch Trump's Primetime Announcement on Supreme Court Pick

organizations.name: watch trump's primetime announcement on supreme court pick donald trump trump

text:
Donald Trump Trump will also be streaming the live event on Facebook. 
President Donald Trump is announcing his pick to fill the vacancy on the U.S. Supreme Court Tuesday night. 
Trump will announce his choice during a primetime televised address from the White House. Set for 8 p.m. ET, the Big Four broadcast networks — ABC, NBC, CBS and Fox — will all break into their Tuesday night programming to air the first live, primetime news event from President Trump. 
Trump is said to have made his selection from a group of three finalists and according to a CNN report, his top two picks, Neil Gorsuch and Thomas Hardiman, both traveled to the White House ahead of the announcement. 
Hours before the announcement, Trump's decision was still being kept uncharacteristically guarded. The secrecy lent to speculation that the president could have changed his mind at the last minute in a bid for the ratings-savvy former Apprentice host to build suspense around the event. 
Trump will also be streaming the address via Facebook Live, a move announced by the White House earlier on Tuesday with a tagline to tune in that rings truer to a promo for a reality show: "You won't want to miss it!" 
Trump also teased the announcement from his personal Twitter account on Monday. 
His choice fills the seat left vacant by Antonin Scalia, who died February 2016.
